name: Karar X
description:
Story
You have been sent to the Karar X Institute which has been locked due to some rumors and security reasons. It is a high technology center. Your mission is to take the control of the institute and make a decision about it. You may either activate or destroy the institute.

Characters


There are 4 high-tech characters of Karar X Institute.
Yulaf: A cute dog
Anna: A lady with jumping skills
Kido: A mechanist with technical skills on assembling and disassembling
James: A strong man

Game Features
- Classical first-person-perspective
- Single player
- Full of unique puzzles
- 4-characters with different skills
- Decision-based story-end
- Crafting
